title: Global Ban (rewrite only)
description:
This cog is highly dangerous and requires you to edit code to use.
It gives you the ability to ban a user from all servers that you have ban permissions on and also blocks that user locally.

[(Check the Source Code)](https://github.com/Bluscream/Discord-Selfbot-Cogs/blob/master/globalban.py)
